name: subarr
description: A lightweight YouTube channel/playlist subscription manager
author: dnlrsr

scripts.build: npm --workspace client run build && npm --workspace server run build
scripts.start-server: npm run build && NODE_ENV=production npm --workspace server start
scripts.start-server-win: npm run build && SET NODE_ENV=production && npm --workspace server start
scripts.update: git pull && npm install && npm run start-server
